Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.impl.type.ConstructorArgumentType
    Use ReflectArgumentType instead.
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.impl.type.EnumArgumentType
    Use ReflectArgumentType instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.impl.Arguments.enumType(Class<T>) 
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.ArgumentParsers.getCjkWidthHack()
    This is not thread safe. Use ArgumentParsers.newFor(String) instead.
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.ArgumentParsers.getFormatWidth()
    This is not thread safe. Use ArgumentParsers.newFor(String) instead.
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.ArgumentParsers.getNoDestConversionForPositionalArgs()
    This is not thread safe. Use ArgumentParsers.newFor(String) instead.
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.ArgumentParsers.getTerminalWidthDetection()
    This is not thread safe. Use ArgumentParsers.newFor(String) instead.
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.ArgumentParsers.isSingleMetavar()
    This is not thread safe. Use ArgumentParsers.newFor(String) instead.
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.ArgumentParsers.newArgumentParser(String)
    This is not thread safe. Use ArgumentParsers.newFor(String) instead.
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.ArgumentParsers.newArgumentParser(String, boolean)
    This is not thread safe. Use ArgumentParsers.newFor(String) instead.
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.ArgumentParsers.newArgumentParser(String, boolean, String)
    This is not thread safe. Use ArgumentParsers.newFor(String) instead.
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.ArgumentParsers.newArgumentParser(String, boolean, String, String)
    This is not thread safe. Use ArgumentParsers.newFor(String) instead.
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.ArgumentParsers.setCJKWidthHack(boolean)
    This is not thread safe. Use ArgumentParsers.newFor(String) instead.
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.ArgumentParsers.setNoDestConversionForPositionalArgs(boolean)
    This is not thread safe. Use ArgumentParsers.newFor(String) instead.
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.ArgumentParsers.setSingleMetavar(boolean)
    This is not thread safe. Use ArgumentParsers.newFor(String) instead.
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.ArgumentParsers.setTerminalWidthDetection(boolean)
    This is not thread safe. Use ArgumentParsers.newFor(String) instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.impl.type.CaseInsensitiveEnumArgumentType(Class<T>)
    Use one of the subclasses, which always convert case correctly.
